data.eml:eml: The spider mites of the genus Eutetranychus Banks (Acari, Trombidiformes, Tetranychidae) from Saudi Arabia: two new species, a re-description, and a key to the world species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamran, Muhammad, Khan, Eid Muhammad, Alatawi, Fahad Jaber (2018): The spider mites of the genus Eutetranychus Banks (Acari, Trombidiformes, Tetranychidae) from Saudi Arabia: two new species, a re-description, and a key to the world species. ZooKeys 799: 47-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.799.25541, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.799.25541
